ModMetaData.name: Boosted Transport Pods
ModMetaData.author: Copper Boltwire
ModMetaData.description:
Boosts the Transport pods range and cap.
* Increases range up to around 222 tiles from 66 tiles. (500 units of max fuel with 100 units of fuel preset upon construction.) * Increases their storage cap to 500kg from 150kg. (Half a ton.) * Building size reduced to 1x1 from 1x2 (Pods also got their gfx size reduced by around ~15%)
Enjoy - I sure do.
Uses the patch system so if loaded early, 99.99% compatible with any other mod. Safe to add mid-game, and Safe to remove mid-game, but deconstruct any pods/launchers before uninstalling mod!
[Unofficially part of my OP-G series.]
